scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:quick: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "PORT=3001 npm run dev --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "PORT=3001 npm run start --workspace=backend" "npm run start --workspace=frontend"
